issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.

fields.description: The {{CompileAssetCatalog}} step is performed even if there are no asset catalog changes. For apps with 300+ assets and 100+ colors, this becomes a 5-12s task.
fields.summary: iOS: Asset catalog is recompiled although it has no changes
